snippet: The illustrator Konstantin Kakanias and his fictional alter ego, Mrs. Tependris, report back from the haute couture shows earlier this month — in pictures.
abstract: The illustrator Konstantin Kakanias and his fictional alter ego, Mrs. Tependris, report back from the haute couture shows earlier this month — in pictures.

headline.main: The Diary of Mrs. Tependris | Complicated Coats and Cabinets of Curiosities at Paris Couture
